title: SurfaceOne Weather Watch Face
summary: SurfaceOne, a stylish analog watch face with weather & forecast
developerAddress:
16, Lorong Rajawali 7,
11900, Bayan Lepas,
Penang, Malaysia.
description: Feature:Time and Date display.Watch and phone battery level indicator.Weather, temperature and forecast (Location permission needed)Change watch face color (16 color for your selection)Elegant watch face design.Simple and clear ambient mode design.Translucent watch hand and notification peek card.Note:If location service is turned off, last known location will be used for weather. Please at least turn on location service 1 time after install this watch face.If internet access is not available, last known weather information will be shown.Weather information will only refresh once in 1-3 hours, base on the update rate from weather provider (open weather map)To install:1. Do allow some times for your mobile to transfer Watch Face to your watch.2. Please execute 'Resync app' under Android Wear App on your mobile after install, this is to synchronize the watch face.3. Long press your watch and choose Basic Watch Face as your watch faceCompatible with all round and square watches.
descriptionHTML:
Feature:
Time and Date display.
Watch and phone battery level indicator.
Weather, temperature and forecast (Location permission needed)
Change watch face color (16 color for your selection)
Elegant watch face design.
Simple and clear ambient mode design.
Translucent watch hand and notification peek card.

Note:
If location service is turned off, last known location will be used for weather. Please at least turn on location service 1 time after install this watch face.
If internet access is not available, last known weather information will be shown.
Weather information will only refresh once in 1-3 hours, base on the update rate from weather provider (open weather map)

To install:
1. Do allow some times for your mobile to transfer Watch Face to your watch.
2. Please execute 'Resync app' under Android Wear App on your mobile after install, this is to synchronize the watch face.
3. Long press your watch and choose Basic Watch Face as your watch face
Compatible with all round and square watches.
comments: Nice design Nice design, work as what it says, value to money. Keep it up.
